entries.title: MCP specification 2025-11-25 released
entries.description: Latest stable release of the MCP specification.

entries.title: Cody v6.8 adds Sourcegraph MCP Server for Enterprise
entries.description: The Sourcegraph Model Context Protocol Server is now available for Enterprise plans.

entries.title: GitHub Copilot for Xcode adds OAuth for MCP
entries.description: Version 0.41.0 adds OAuth support for remote GitHub MCP servers and MCP logs access from settings.

entries.title: GitHub Copilot MCP support for JetBrains reaches GA
entries.description: Model Context Protocol support for GitHub Copilot in JetBrains IDEs is now generally available.

entries.title: JetBrains 2025.2 adds built-in MCP server
entries.description: IntelliJ IDEA 2025.2 includes a built-in MCP server, allowing external clients like Claude Desktop and Cursor to access IDE tools.

entries.title: VS Code MCP support reaches general availability
entries.description: VS Code 1.102 makes MCP generally available with MCP view, gallery for server management, and profiles/Settings Sync support.

entries.title: GitHub Copilot for Xcode adds remote MCP servers
entries.description: Version 0.38.0 adds support for connecting to remote MCP server instances.

entries.title: MCP specification 2025-06-18 released
entries.description: Adds elicitation, roots, and streamable HTTP transport. Deprecates SSE transport.

entries.title: VS Code gains full MCP specification support
entries.description: VS Code now supports the complete MCP specification including tools, prompts, resources, sampling, authorization, and HTTP transport.

entries.title: Cursor 1.0 adds one-click MCP setup
entries.description: Cursor 1.0 release brings one-click MCP server installation with OAuth support and a curated list of official MCP servers.

entries.title: Cody v6.4 adds MCP tools in agentic context gathering
entries.description: Cody can now invoke locally configured MCP tools automatically during agentic context gathering.

entries.title: GitHub Copilot MCP support for JetBrains in public preview
entries.description: Agent mode and MCP support for GitHub Copilot in JetBrains IDEs enters public preview.

entries.title: GitHub Copilot for Xcode adds MCP support
entries.description: Version 0.35.0 introduces Model Context Protocol support with MCP tools configuration in Agent Mode.

entries.title: Visual Studio 2022 v17.14 adds MCP support
entries.description: MCP support reaches general availability with server management, OAuth authentication, prompts, resources, sampling, and elicitation features.

entries.title: Amazon Q Developer CLI adds MCP support
entries.description: Amazon Q Developer CLI now supports Model Context Protocol, enabling developers to extend Q's capabilities with external tools and data sources.

entries.title: JetBrains 2025.1 adds MCP client support
entries.description: IntelliJ IDEA 2025.1 introduces full MCP client support in AI Assistant, allowing connection to external MCP servers.

entries.title: VS Code 1.99 introduces MCP tools support
entries.description: Initial MCP support with tools, server discovery and management, configuration via .vscode/mcp.json.

entries.title: MCP specification 2025-03-26 released
entries.description: Stable release of the March 2025 MCP specification revision.

entries.title: Windsurf Wave 3 adds MCP support
entries.description: Codeium's Windsurf IDE introduces MCP support in Wave 3 release, allowing Cascade to access external data sources through MCP servers.

entries.title: GitHub Copilot for Xcode public preview
entries.description: Version 0.31.0 released as public preview with Copilot Chat support and GitHub Free plan support.

entries.title: Cline v3.2.0 announces MCP server enhancements
entries.description: First major release featuring MCP with toggle on/off functionality and auto-approve settings for individual servers.

entries.title: Cline v3.0.0 includes MCP SDK
entries.description: MCP SDK dependency (@modelcontextprotocol/sdk v1.0.1) first appears in Cline, enabling MCP server integration.

entries.title: JetBrains releases MCP proxy server
entries.description: JetBrains releases mcp-jetbrains, a TypeScript-based proxy server for connecting AI assistants to JetBrains IDEs via MCP.

entries.title: Continue adds MCP support
entries.description: Continue becomes one of the first clients to offer full support for all MCP features including resources, prompts, and tools.

entries.title: Zed adds MCP support via extensions
entries.description: Zed extensions can now source AI Assistant context via standardized MCP servers, initially supporting prompts via slash commands.

entries.title: Sourcegraph Cody adds MCP support
entries.description: Cody becomes one of the first tools to support MCP, enabling integration with external data sources through OpenCtx.

entries.title: Model Context Protocol announced
entries.description: Anthropic open-sources MCP, a new standard for connecting AI assistants to data systems. Claude Desktop ships with MCP support. Pre-built servers for Google Drive, Slack, GitHub, Git, Postgres, and Puppeteer available at launch.
